intent: Route queries using llama3 model, in ai-gateway deployment, with semantic caching, with PII detection, with tool selection, with 6 routing decisions
use_case: Configuration for ai-gateway deployment with semantic_cache, pii_detection, tools
full_config:
vllm_endpoints:
  - name: "endpoint_1"
    address: "172.20.0.5"
    port: 8000
    weight: 1

model_config:
  "llama3":
    reasoning_family: "qwen3"
    preferred_endpoints: ["endpoint_1"]

categories:
  - name: biology
    description: "Biology related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["biology"]
  - name: physics
    description: "Physics related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["physics"]
  - name: economics
    description: "Economics related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["economics"]
  - name: computer_science
    description: "Computer_science related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["computer_science"]
  - name: business
    description: "Business related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["business"]
  - name: law
    description: "Law related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["law"]

strategy: "priority"

decisions:
  - name: "biology_decision"
    description: "Biology related queries"
    priority: 100
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "biology"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "llama3"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a biology expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"

  - name: "physics_decision"
    description: "Physics related queries"
    priority: 90
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "physics"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "llama3"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a physics expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"

  - name: "economics_decision"
    description: "Economics related queries"
    priority: 80
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "economics"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "llama3"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a economics expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.87

  - name: "computer_science_decision"
    description: "Computer_science related queries"
    priority: 70
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "computer_science"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "llama3"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a computer_science expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"

  - name: "business_decision"
    description: "Business related queries"
    priority: 60
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "business"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "llama3"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a business expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.93

  - name: "law_decision"
    description: "Law related queries"
    priority: 50
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "law"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "llama3"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a law expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.81

default_model: llama3

reasoning_families:
  qwen3:
    type: "chat_template_kwargs"
    parameter: "enable_thinking"

default_reasoning_effort: high

semantic_cache:
  enabled: true
  backend_type: "memory"
  similarity_threshold: 0.73
  max_entries: 1000
  ttl_seconds: 3600
  use_hnsw: true
  hnsw_m: 16
  hnsw_ef_construction: 200

classifier:
  category_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-domain-classifier"
    threshold: 0.6
    use_cpu: true
  pii_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-pii-classifier"
    threshold: 0.9
    use_cpu: true

tools:
  enabled: true
  top_k: 3
  similarity_threshold: 0.2
  tools_db_path: "config/tools_db.json"
  fallback_to_empty: true

    rules:

default_model: qwen3

reasoning_families:
  qwen3:
    type: "chat_template_kwargs"
    parameter: "enable_thinking"

default_reasoning_effort: high

semantic_cache:
  enabled: true
  backend_type: "milvus"
  similarity_threshold: 0.85
  max_entries: 1000
  ttl_seconds: 3600

classifier:
  category_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-domain-classifier"
    threshold: 0.6
    use_cpu: true
  pii_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-pii-classifier"
    threshold: 0.9
    use_cpu: true

tools:
  enabled: true
  top_k: 3
  similarity_threshold: 0.2
  tools_db_path: "config/tools_db.json"
  fallback_to_empty: true

observability:
  metrics:
    enabled: true
  tracing:
    enabled: true
    provider: "opentelemetry"
    exporter:
      type: "otlp"
      endpoint: "jaeger:4317"
      insecure: true
    sampling:
      type: "always_on"
      rate: 1.0
    resource:
      service_name: "vllm-semantic-router"
      service_version: "v0.1.0"
      deployment_environment: "quickstart"

full_config:
vllm_endpoints:
  - name: "endpoint_2"
    address: "172.16.0.10"
    port: 8000
    weight: 2

model_config:
  "phi4":
    reasoning_family: "qwen3"
    preferred_endpoints: ["endpoint_2"]

categories:
  - name: health
    description: "Health related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["health"]
  - name: chemistry
    description: "Chemistry related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["chemistry"]
  - name: physics
    description: "Physics related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["physics"]
  - name: history
    description: "History related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["history"]
  - name: law
    description: "Law related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["law"]
  - name: economics
    description: "Economics related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["economics"]
  - name: philosophy
    description: "Philosophy related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["philosophy"]
  - name: biology
    description: "Biology related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["biology"]

strategy: "priority"

decisions:
  - name: "health_decision"
    description: "Health related queries"
    priority: 100
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "health"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "phi4"
        use_reasoning: true
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a health expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.84

  - name: "chemistry_decision"
    description: "Chemistry related queries"
    priority: 90
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "chemistry"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "phi4"
        use_reasoning: true
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a chemistry expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."

  - name: "physics_decision"
    description: "Physics related queries"
    priority: 80
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "physics"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "phi4"
        use_reasoning: true
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a physics expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.79

  - name: "history_decision"
    description: "History related queries"
    priority: 70
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "history"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "phi4"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a history expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.72

  - name: "law_decision"
    description: "Law related queries"
    priority: 60
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "law"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "phi4"
        use_reasoning: true
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a law expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.8

  - name: "economics_decision"
    description: "Economics related queries"
    priority: 50
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "economics"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "phi4"
        use_reasoning: true
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a economics expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."

  - name: "philosophy_decision"
    description: "Philosophy related queries"
    priority: 40
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "philosophy"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "phi4"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a philosophy expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.88

  - name: "biology_decision"
    description: "Biology related queries"
    priority: 30
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "biology"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "phi4"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a biology expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."

default_model: phi4

reasoning_families:
  qwen3:
    type: "chat_template_kwargs"
    parameter: "enable_thinking"

default_reasoning_effort: high

semantic_cache:
  enabled: true
  backend_type: "memory"
  similarity_threshold: 0.75
  max_entries: 1000
  ttl_seconds: 3600
  use_hnsw: true
  hnsw_m: 16
  hnsw_ef_construction: 200

tools:
  enabled: true
  top_k: 3
  similarity_threshold: 0.2
  tools_db_path: "config/tools_db.json"
  fallback_to_empty: true

intent: Route queries using openai/gpt-oss-20b model, in kubernetes deployment, with semantic caching, with PII detection, with tool selection, with 6 routing decisions
use_case: Configuration for kubernetes deployment with semantic_cache, pii_detection, tools
full_config:
vllm_endpoints:
  - name: "endpoint_3"
    address: "192.168.1.100"
    port: 8002
    weight: 2

model_config:
  "openai/gpt-oss-20b":
    reasoning_family: "gpt-oss"
    preferred_endpoints: ["endpoint_3"]

categories:
  - name: psychology
    description: "Psychology related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["psychology"]
  - name: economics
    description: "Economics related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["economics"]
  - name: business
    description: "Business related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["business"]
  - name: law
    description: "Law related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["law"]
  - name: health
    description: "Health related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["health"]
  - name: other
    description: "Other related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["other"]

strategy: "priority"

decisions:
  - name: "psychology_decision"
    description: "Psychology related queries"
    priority: 100
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "psychology"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "openai/gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a psychology expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"

  - name: "economics_decision"
    description: "Economics related queries"
    priority: 90
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "economics"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "openai/gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a economics expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.82

  - name: "business_decision"
    description: "Business related queries"
    priority: 80
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "business"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "openai/gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a business expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.82

  - name: "law_decision"
    description: "Law related queries"
    priority: 70
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "law"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "openai/gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a law expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.86

  - name: "health_decision"
    description: "Health related queries"
    priority: 60
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "health"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "openai/gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a health expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"

  - name: "other_decision"
    description: "Other related queries"
    priority: 50
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "other"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "openai/gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a other expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.75

default_model: openai/gpt-oss-20b

reasoning_families:
  gpt-oss:
    type: "reasoning_effort"
    parameter: "reasoning_effort"

default_reasoning_effort: high

semantic_cache:
  enabled: true
  backend_type: "milvus"
  similarity_threshold: 0.83
  max_entries: 1000
  ttl_seconds: 3600

classifier:
  category_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-domain-classifier"
    threshold: 0.6
    use_cpu: true
  pii_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-pii-classifier"
    threshold: 0.9
    use_cpu: true

tools:
  enabled: true
  top_k: 3
  similarity_threshold: 0.2
  tools_db_path: "config/tools_db.json"
  fallback_to_empty: true

    description: "Physics related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["physics"]
  - name: psychology
    description: "Psychology related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["psychology"]
  - name: engineering
    description: "Engineering related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["engineering"]
  - name: economics
    description: "Economics related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["economics"]
  - name: other
    description: "Other related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["other"]
  - name: biology
    description: "Biology related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["biology"]
  - name: health
    description: "Health related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["health"]
  - name: computer_science
    description: "Computer_science related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["computer_science"]
  - name: business
    description: "Business related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["business"]

strategy: "priority"

decisions:
  - name: "physics_decision"
    description: "Physics related queries"
    priority: 100
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "physics"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "openai/gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a physics expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.76

  - name: "psychology_decision"

    priority: 90

        configuration:
          enabled: true

    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "other"

    port: 8001
    weight: 1

model_config:
  "gpt-oss-20b":
    reasoning_family: "gpt-oss"
    preferred_endpoints: ["endpoint_2"]

categories:
  - name: math
    description: "Math related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["math"]
  - name: chemistry
    description: "Chemistry related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["chemistry"]

strategy: "priority"

decisions:
  - name: "math_decision"
    description: "Math related queries"
    priority: 100
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "math"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a math expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"

  - name: "chemistry_decision"
    description: "Chemistry related queries"
    priority: 90
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "chemistry"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a chemistry expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"

default_model: gpt-oss-20b

reasoning_families:
  gpt-oss:
    type: "reasoning_effort"
    parameter: "reasoning_effort"

default_reasoning_effort: high

classifier:
  category_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-domain-classifier"
    threshold: 0.6
    use_cpu: true
  pii_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-pii-classifier"
    threshold: 0.9
    use_cpu: true

tools:
  enabled: true
  top_k: 3
  similarity_threshold: 0.2
  tools_db_path: "config/tools_db.json"
  fallback_to_empty: true

reasoning_families:

observability:

    provider: "opentelemetry"

      type: "otlp"
      endpoint: "jaeger:4317"
      insecure: true
    sampling:
      type: "always_on"
      rate: 1.0
    resource:
      service_name: "vllm-semantic-router"
      service_version: "v0.1.0"
      deployment_environment: "quickstart"

model_config:

    reasoning_family: "qwen3"
    preferred_endpoints: ["endpoint_4"]

categories:
  - name: biology
    description: "Biology related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["biology"]
  - name: law
    description: "Law related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["law"]
  - name: math
    description: "Math related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["math"]
  - name: computer_science

  - name: business

  - name: philosophy

strategy: "priority"

decisions:

    description: "Biology related queries"
    priority: 100
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "biology"
    modelRefs:

    plugins:

        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a biology expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"

          similarity_threshold: 0.73

default_model: qwen3

reasoning_families:
  qwen3:
    type: "chat_template_kwargs"
    parameter: "enable_thinking"

default_reasoning_effort: high

semantic_cache:
  enabled: true
  backend_type: "memory"
  similarity_threshold: 0.74
  max_entries: 1000
  ttl_seconds: 3600
  use_hnsw: true
  hnsw_m: 16
  hnsw_ef_construction: 200

classifier:
  category_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-domain-classifier"
    threshold: 0.6
    use_cpu: true
  pii_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-pii-classifier"
    threshold: 0.9
    use_cpu: true

tools:
  enabled: true
  top_k: 3
  similarity_threshold: 0.2
  tools_db_path: "config/tools_db.json"
  fallback_to_empty: true

      rate: 1.0

default_model: phi4

reasoning_families:
  qwen3:
    type: "chat_template_kwargs"
    parameter: "enable_thinking"

default_reasoning_effort: high

semantic_cache:
  enabled: true
  backend_type: "redis"
  similarity_threshold: 0.82
  max_entries: 1000
  ttl_seconds: 3600

classifier:
  category_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-domain-classifier"
    threshold: 0.6
    use_cpu: true
  pii_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-pii-classifier"

tools:
  enabled: true
  top_k: 3
  similarity_threshold: 0.2
  tools_db_path: "config/tools_db.json"
  fallback_to_empty: true

observability:
  metrics:
    enabled: true
  tracing:
    enabled: true
    provider: "opentelemetry"
    exporter:
      type: "otlp"
      endpoint: "jaeger-collector:4317"
      insecure: true
    sampling:
      type: "always_on"
      rate: 1.0
    resource:
      service_name: "vllm-semantic-router"
      service_version: "v0.1.0"
      deployment_environment: "kubernetes"

  - name: "philosophy_decision"

default_reasoning_effort: high

tools:

observability:

      type: "always_on"

      deployment_environment: "ai-gateway"
